English: Lü Buwei (?291-235 BC), merchant and politician of the State of Qin `秦國~|`秦~国[Qin2 guo2], subsequent Qin Dynasty `秦~`代~[Qin2 dai4] Chancellor, allegedly the father of Ying Zheng `嬴政~[Ying2 Zheng4], who subsequently became the first emperor Qin Shihuang `秦始皇~[Qin2 Shi3 huang2]

Lü Buwei (?291-235 BC), merchant and politician of the State of Qin `秦國~|`秦~国[Qin2 guo2], subsequent Qin Dynasty `秦~`代~[Qin2 dai4] Chancellor, allegedly the father of Ying Zheng `嬴政~[Ying2 Zheng4], who subsequently became the first emperor Qin Shihuang `秦始皇~[Qin2 Shi3 huang2]
